title: Union Budget 2026 highlights: Top 5 tech and AI announcements by FM Nirmala Sitharaman driving India’s digital future
description: The Union Budget 2026, presented by Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman, outlined several major initiatives aimed at strengthening India’s digital future, with key announcements focused on technology, artificial intelligence, and innovation.
content: The Union Budget 2026 announced today has made it clear that government wants technology to assist in India’s growth. Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman during her 9th consecutive budget announced several steps to support areas like artificial intel... [2456 chars]

title: I built AI software. Florida's AI bill makes sense | Opinion
description: Florida should pass SB 482, the Artificial Intelligence Bill of Rights
content:
A Florida bill, SB 482, would establish consumer protections related to artificial intelligence.
The proposed legislation includes the right to know when interacting with AI and protections against deepfakes.
The bill also aims to restrict the sale o... [4269 chars]

title: I built AI software. Florida's AI bill makes sense | Opinion
description: Florida should pass SB 482, the Artificial Intelligence Bill of Rights
content:
The bill would establish basic consumer protections, such as the right to know when you're talking to an AI instead of a human.
I spent my career building software that used artificial intelligence and machine learning to help Fortune 1000 companies ... [4051 chars]

title: Union Budget 2026 bets big on AI as IndiaAI Mission gets Rs 1,000 crore push
description: With a Rs 1,000 crore IndiaAI Mission push, Budget 2026 places artificial intelligence at the heart of jobs, infrastructure and India’s long-term technology-led growth story
content: Union Budget 2026 has put artificial intelligence firmly at the centre of India’s growth blueprint, with the government allocating Rs 1,000 crore to the IndiaAI Mission, one of the largest outlays under its emerging technology agenda. Presenting the ... [2677 chars]

title: OpenAI Investment Was 'Never A Commitment,' Nvidia's Huang Says
description: Nvidia said it planned to invest as much as $100 billion in OpenAI to support new data centers and other artificial intelligence infrastructure.
content:
Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang said the company's proposed $100 billion investment in OpenAI was "never a commitment" and that the company would consider any funding rounds "one at a time."
"It was never a commitment," Huang told r... [849 chars]

title: What Nirmala Sitharaman Said About AI, DeepTech And Semiconductors
description: The budget prioritised artificial intelligence, semiconductors and DeepTech research as essential elements for industrial productivity.
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman presented the union budget for the fiscal year 2026/27 on Feb. 1, making some key announcements, including an STT hike for derivative trades, introduction of new High Speed Rail Corridors and push for rare earth pr... [2149 chars]

title: Budget 2026: Industry hails data centre tax holiday as move to make India 'digital backbone for the world'
description: The measures come as India looks to scale domestic digital infrastructure alongside rising demand from artificial intelligence workloads, data localisation norms and hyperscaler expansion plans.
